SEARCH
Package pegasus.grid

Interface DoubleGrid

All Superinterfaces:
BaseGrid<Double>, BinaryIndexedDoubleIterable, Iterable<Double>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DoubleArrayGrid, Matrix
public interface DoubleGrid extends BaseGrid<Double>, BinaryIndexedDoubleIterable
A value-based primitive grid of double values.
See Also:
  • BaseGrid
  • DoubleArrayGrid

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the array is not rectangular
      NullPointerException - When the array contains a null row

    • fillRange

      void fillRange(int r1, int c1, int r2, int c2, double value) throws BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Fills a sub-portion of this grid with the values of the provided value.
      Parameters:
      r1 - The starting row index (inclusive)
      c1 - The starting column index (inclusive)
      r2 - The ending row index (exclusive)
      c2 - The ending column index (exclusive)
      value - The value of which to fill the sub-portion with
      Throws:
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the range is invalid, or is out of bounds

    • fillRange

      void fillRange(int r1, int c1, int r2, int c2, DoubleGrid g) throws BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Fills a sub-portion of this grid with the values of the provided grid g.
      Parameters:
      r1 - The starting row index (inclusive)
      c1 - The starting column index (inclusive)
      r2 - The ending row index (exclusive)
      c2 - The ending column index (exclusive)
      g - The source grid of which to retrieve elements from
      Throws:
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the range is invalid, or is out of bounds
      NullPointerException - When the provided grid g is null

    • merge

      DoubleGrid merge(DoubleGrid g, DoubleBinaryOperator merger) throws IncompatibleDimensionsException
      Applies the provided merger function to each corresponding pair of elements between this grid and the provided grid g, then returns a new grid whose elements are populated from that of the return values of the provided merger function.
      Parameters:
      g - The grid of which to merge this grid with
      merger - The merger function of which to handle the merging of the two grids
      Returns:
      The resulting grid
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDimensionsException - When the grids' dimensions are different
      NullPointerException - When either the provided grid g or the merger function is null

    • resize

      DoubleGrid resize(int rows, int columns)
      Returns a new grid with the provided dimensions whose elements are populated from that of this grid's elements, trimmed or padded with 0 values as necessary.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows to resize to
      columns - The number of columns to resize to
      Returns:
      The resized grid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the dimensions produce negative area
